extendedInfo.description: SOS Responseâ¢ is a mobile monitoring app which when activated, instantly sends photo and GPS information to a professional 24/7 monitoring team. Perfect for work-alone situations where safety and liability concerns exist, the SOS Response team can use the information provided to immediately contact police, fire, ambulatory or mobile security professionals. With 30 photos taken in just 30 seconds, the touch of a button puts the SOS Response team at your disposal.To learn more about SOS Responseâ¢ please visit: http://www.sos-response.com/
